tooltip.beaconite813.unstable_beacon_blo: §9Requires a level 5 beacon base and visibility to the sky.
§9Then, supply a nether star, and run away if you want to live.
§9Make sure to check the crater afterwards for a special surprise...
§9You'll get better loot by making a bigger beacon, but this will make the explosion much larger.
§9Also instakills all withers in range. Nether star farm, anyone?
tooltip.beaconite813.constructor1.toolti: §9For every beacon block below the constructor, it will build a base of the corresponding area.
tooltip.beaconite813.constructor2.toolti: §9You can get a max of §520§9 levels by default, changeable in the config.
tooltip.beaconite813.quarry_talisman.too: §9If placed in the constructor's input, will make the constructor destroy blocks instead of placing them.
tooltip.beaconite813.vengeant_beacon1.to: §9Gives the §5wrath§9 effect to all players in the area.
tooltip.beaconite813.vengeant_beacon2.to: §9Requires 10 skulls (placed on or above the  beacon base blocks) to activate, and 10 times more skulls for each level.
tooltip.beaconite813.vengeant_beacon4.to: §5100§9 skulls are required for level §5X§9 effects.
tooltip.beaconite813.regal_beacon1.toolt: §9Gives the §5Rot of Midas§9 effect to all non-player and nonnamed mobs in the area using Gold Time.
tooltip.beaconite813.regal_beacon2.toolt: §9Gives the §5Hypertrophy§9 effect to all non-player and nonnamed mobs in the area using Loot Time.
tooltip.beaconite813.living_beacon1.tool: §9Consumes foods in the yellow slot and applies the food effects to nearby players.
tooltip.beaconite813.living_beacon2.tool: §9Add extra food in the red slot to increase duration.
tooltip.beaconite813.living_beacon3.tool: §9More effects mean that filling the beacon will be harder.
tooltip.beaconite813.living_beacon4.tool: §9Minimum beacon level is §58§9, maximum level is §515§9(Level §5X§9 effects)
tooltip.beaconite813.living_beacon5.tool: §9When satiation runs out, all effects will be reset... Feed it regularly!
tooltip.beaconite813.living_beacon6.tool: §9Also: Don't feed this a pufferfish. It will work and you will probably die.
tooltip.beaconite813.amorph_beacon1.tool: §9Forms Bubbles around the beacon that grant conduit power.
tooltip.beaconite813.amorph_beacon3.tool: §9Higher levels shrink the range of bubble spawning, but make the bubbles give less time.
tooltip.beaconite813.igneous_beacon1.too: §9Gives §5Speed§9, §5Strength§9, and §5Jump Boost§9 in exchange for fire damage.
tooltip.beaconite813.igneous_beacon2.too: §9Make sure you have some water handy...
§9This block is used to form all other special beacons.
§9Place this beacon in the center of a 3x3 cube of a fitting material.
§9Blocks made using encapsulated light can all be used, and will create different special beacons.
tooltip.beaconite813.ethereal_beacon1.to: §9Stores Potion Effects and converts them into stronger or weaker variants.
tooltip.beaconite813.ethereal_beacon2.to: §9Each level costs double the duration, so a level §510§9 potion won't last very long.
tooltip.beaconite813.ethereal_beacon3.to: §9Can be outfitted with modules to change the beacon's behavior.
tooltip.beaconite813.ethereal_beacon4.to: §9Requires a level §510§9 beacon base to activate.
tooltip.beaconite813.transmute_module1.t: §9Fills a different potion's duration with the held potion effect.
tooltip.beaconite813.transmute_module2.t: §9Transmuted time is halved, and the last effect is considered for transmutation.
tooltip.beaconite813.transmute_module3.t: §9The top five slots are held potion inputs, and the bottom five are transmutation outputs.
tooltip.beaconite813.infuse_module1.tool: §9Turns select items into other Items using potion time.
tooltip.beaconite813.infuse_module2.tool: §9All slots are inputs except for the middle bottom input, which is where the infusible item goes.
tooltip.beaconite813.diffuse_module1.too: §9Diffuses the held potion effect in a range around the beacon.
tooltip.beaconite813.diffuse_module2.too: §9All slots are inputs. Diffused effect is level §51§9.
tooltip.beaconite813.diffuse_module3.too: §9Adding more diffusion modules will raise the level of the effect, in exchange for a lower duration.
tooltip.beaconite813.diffuse_module4.too: §9However, the difference scales by §51.5§9 instead of §52§9, making it more efficient for high-level effects.
tooltip.beaconite813.aura_module1.toolti: §9Pulls effects from nearby entities or players.
tooltip.beaconite813.aura_module2.toolti: §9Splash or lingering effects are accounted for, so these are often less efficient than a traditional potion.
tooltip.beaconite813.aura_module3.toolti: §9More entities in the range will NOT add more time!
tooltip.beaconite813.aura_module4.toolti: §9Splash ethereal potions interfere with the Aura Module's condensers. Any splashed effects cannot be collected.
§9Instantly clears all time from an ethereal beacon, and drains as non-instant effects in input slots.
tooltip.beaconite813.bottomless_bottle_j: §5§o"Which, as you can see, is bottomless"
tooltip.beaconite813.negative_beacon1.to: §9Inverts potion effects to a random positive/negative effect, except those that are from beacons and other ambient sources.
tooltip.beaconite813.negative_beacon2.to: §9Each additional level will retain one level of potency from the inverted effect.
tooltip.beaconite813.invert_talisman1.to: §5§oWhen placed into a constructor, it will build in the opposite direction.
§5§oSplash ethereal potions interfere with the Aura Module's condensers. effects will not be collected.
tooltip.beaconite813.wrath_effect.toolti: §5§oDeal more damage multiplicatively, but negate two levels of resistance per level. Watch out, you'll start taking more damage if you run out of levels!
tooltip.beaconite813.capsaicin_effect.to: §5§oJump high, run fast, and hit hard... before you burn up!
tooltip.beaconite813.midas_rot_effect.to: §5§oTake §1Void§5§o damage, but drop gold every time you get hurt.
§5§oAffected mobs drop more loot when killed, but get a little tougher in exchange.
tooltip.beaconite813.wrath_flesh.tooltip: §5§oNote: This is also a polymorph crafting block!
tooltip.beaconite813.disabled.tooltip: §4This item has been disabled by the pack author! Recipes may still be enabled, but this item will not do anything.
